fields.description:
It would save developer code if {{loginKeyboardType}} and {{loginReturnKeyType}} would fall back to {{keyboardType}} and {{returnKeyType}} if they are not set.

Code:
https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/579df813d201f47b8cd9cad4dc655536d5710332/iphone/Classes/TiUIAlertDialogProxy.m#L163-L183
fields.summary: iOS AlertDialog: Let login- and password specific properties fallback to general ones
